name: Rex Rampage
description:
A long time ago a Mayan maze was discovered. Many have been brave enough to enter, but many have never been seen again. Legend says a monster roams the walls of the maze, so are you brave enough to enter?

With a dramatic sound track, scary sound and stunning visual effects this 3D maze is like no other. Each turn made and the more deeper into the maze you go disorientation will increase making this Mayan maze a real puzzle to solve.
